Root.name: Basic service or feature
Root.description: Provide a service such as customer support, payment service, communication, account management, purchasing, that the user explicitly requests and that is part of the website or app or company or organisation's basic service or functionality.

Root.name: Additional service or feature
Root.description: Provide a service that the user explicitly requests but that is not a necessary part of the website or app or company or organisation's basic service. Additional services/features may enhance user experience or add convenience but require additional data.
items: a store finder that needs location information

Root.name: Social media integration
Root.description: Provide a service that incorporate social media platforms and features into a website or company's operations, enhancing user engagement, brand visibility, and customer interaction. It bridges the website or company's digital presence with popular social media channels, creating a seamless interaction between the two.

Root.name: Advertising
Root.description: To show ads that are either targeted to the specific user or not targeted, or other general advertising activities

Root.name: Marketing
Root.description: To contact the user to offer products, services, or other promotions (e.g., send marketing emails, calling or texting user with marketing messages). Marketing typically requires the use of contact information.

Root.name: Analytics or Research
Root.description: For understanding the website or app or company or organisation's audience, improving the website/app, improving the quality of products or services, inform company strategy, or general research.

Root.name: Personalization or Customization
Root.description: For providing user with a personalized experience, e.g., by allowing to arrange how the website/app looks, based on the userâ€™s preferences or language, etc.

Root.name: Operational Integrity and Security
Root.description: For ensuring the proper functioning and security of the website or app, including enforcing terms of service, preventing fraud, safeguarding user data, protecting company assets, and maintaining a safe and trustworthy digital environment, etc.

Root.name: Legal requirement
Root.description: For compliance with legal obligations, e.g., regulations, government data requests, government retention requests, law enforcement requests in general, etc.

Root.name: Merger/Acquisition
Root.description: If company/organization merges or is acquired it transfers users' information to another company/organization.

Root.name: Other
Root.description: Other specific purpose not covered above.

Root.name: Unspecified
Root.description: The purpose is not explicitly stated or is unclear.
